definition: klystron (electronic tube used to produce high frequency radio waves)
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The trend and further application of MBK technology are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了多注速调管技术的发展趋势和应用范围。

sentences.english: The main component of experiment equipment of coherent harmonic radiation in Hefei is optical klystron.
sentences.chinese: 合肥相干谐波辐射实验装置的主体部分是光学速调管。

sentences.english: High-power klystron are used in radar transmitter more and more.
sentences.chinese: 大功率速调管在雷达发射机中的运用越来越广泛。

sentences.english: The electromagnetic wave is produced by microwave tubes called klystrons.
sentences.chinese: 电磁波是由一种称为速调管的微波电子管产生的。

sentences.english: Some structural and electric para meter characteristics of the MBK were explained in the article.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了多束速调管的结构特点和一些特性估计。

pinyin: ban4 dao3 ti3 tan4 ce4 qi4
